mapper.insert: insert into distribution (dis_id, dis_name, pro_id, cit_id, adm_id, dis_phone, dis_address, dis_remarks) values (#{disId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update distribution set dis_name = #{disName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pro_id = #{proId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cit_id = #{citId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adm_id = #{admId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dis_phone = #{disPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dis_address = #{disAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dis_remarks = #{disRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dis_id = #{disId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dis_id, dis_name, pro_id, cit_id, adm_id, dis_phone, dis_address, dis_remarks from distribution
